about_the_game:
Inseedious is an amazing Slavic roguelite featuring two key mechanics: a level creator and a dungeon crawler. Players explore user-generated maps inspired by Slavic mythology to reclaim their place in a world ravaged by the war between the Slavic gods Perun and Veles. Fight, create, and... farm?

Explore various lands filled with monsters, magical honey fountains, treasure islands, and adventure opportunities.

During each attempt, you'll fight against monsters that once roamed Slavic lands, scaring folks, making women tremble, and keeping babies awake. Explore our bestiary to learn more about their origins, behavior, and most importantly: how to get rid of them.
detailed_description:
Inseedious is an amazing Slavic roguelite featuring two key mechanics: a level creator and a dungeon crawler. Players explore user-generated maps inspired by Slavic mythology to reclaim their place in a world ravaged by the war between the Slavic gods Perun and Veles. Fight, create, and... farm?

Explore various lands filled with monsters, magical honey fountains, treasure islands, and adventure opportunities.

During each attempt, you'll fight against monsters that once roamed Slavic lands, scaring folks, making women tremble, and keeping babies awake. Explore our bestiary to learn more about their origins, behavior, and most importantly: how to get rid of them.
name: Inseedious

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DX10+ compable
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DX10+ compable
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Slavic roguelite featuring a level creator and dungeon crawler. Explore user-generated maps inspired by Slavic mythology, reclaim your place in a world torn by Perun and Veles, and fight legendary monsters. Discover various lands, face mythical creatures, and learn how to defeat them.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
